mapper.select: SELECT u.`user_id`, u.`username`, r.`name`, r.`name_zh` FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.`user_id`=ur.`user_id` LEFT JOIN t_role r ON ur.`role_id`=r.`role_id` WHERE u.`username`= #{username}
SELECT rp.`role_id`, p.`perm_id`, p.`name` FROM t_role_perm rp LEFT JOIN t_perm p ON rp.`perm_id`=p.`perm_id` WHERE rp.`role_id`=#{roleId}

SELECT t_perm.`name` FROM t_perm WHERE t_perm.`perm_id` IN (SELECT perm_id FROM t_role_perm WHERE t_role_perm.`role_id` = (SELECT role_id FROM t_user_role WHERE t_user_role.`user_id` IN (SELECT user_id FROM t_user WHERE t_user.`username` = #{principal})))
